A '''quiz block''' is a block that is used to set up student quizzes.

== Obtaining ==
Teachers can obtain the quiz block from their [[Creative inventory]].

== Usage ==
{{Missing information|Details about quiz editor:
* How does it work?
* Can teachers do multiple choice answers and/or typing response questions?
* Is it automatically graded?
* Add more info if needed|type=section}}
The quiz block is a block that teachers can place in their [[world]]. Right-clicking on it as a teacher will open a menu in which teachers can create quizzes for students to answer.
